content.contentleft: Adhering to the “Self-directed Enquiry • Learn to Learn” concept, EVIGarten suggests contents children might be interested in through AI to promote self-directed learning.
content.contentmiddle: EVIGarten provides a wide diversity of courses. For example, “Explore 360” enables children to explore the world while “Knowledge in Life” provides ten daily lives topics for kindergartens. There are also other multimedia learning courses for children.
content.contentright: EVIGarten provides both parents and children with a comprehensive learning portfolio, so that parents can learn about their children’s learning interest and progression at ease. Achievement records with an adorable design also help boost children’s learning motivation.

course.title: Knowledge in Life
course.content: Get access to ten daily lives topics, including Transportation, Animals, Nature, Community, Health and Hygiene, School, Go Green, Food, Self and Family, and People who help us. Children can learn about different topics depending on their interests. “MC Questions”, “Worksheets” and “Project Exploration” are available.

explore.title: Explore 360
explore.content: With animated stories, thinking questions, games and moral education, students are encouraged to explore and think more, so as to construct knowledge.

festival.title: Festivals
festival.content: Animations featuring “Christmas”, “Lunar New Year”, “Mid-Autumn Festival” and other festivals are available for teachers to use in class, or for parents and children to watch together at home, so that children can have more understanding of different festivals.

chinese.title: Language (Chinese)
chinese.content: Animated stories are made in accordance with the ten topics. Trilingual versions, Cantonese, English and Putonghua, are available. After watching the animated stories, children can complete the “Exercises” or “Thinking questions” to reinforce knowledge and cultivate self-learning abilities.

change.title: Text changes
change.content: According to the commonality and difficulty of the words, 60 common words of kindergartens were selected to introduce their pronunciation, stroke order and text evolution in vivid animation, and to provide a fun word-matching game.

story.title: Virtue Stories
story.content: By telling the stories of different ancient celebrities and the experience of our daily lives in an interesting way, children are able to cultivate good moral character and establish correct values. Each unit has a different topic.

phonics.title: Phonics
phonics.content: Phonics made easy! Get your kids to learn phonics through animated stories, nursery rhymes and simple actions! Each phonic is matched with word practice for your kids to build their vocabularies.

planPopup.txt:
Concept:

Parents generally put their children’s education in a significant position, but parent education is very important as well, so that EVI cooperates with The Hong Kong Institute of Family Education to provide CEO Parents (Childhood Education) Certificate Scheme. It divides the content into 5 categories, including Emotion Management, Behavior Management, Parent-Child Relationships, Child Health and Child Study. It aims to encourage parents to be competent, effective and optimistic through reading different practical articles and watching videos, so as to enhance the ability of parents to educate their children and to build up a close rapport with their children.

Details:

Parents will receive a e-sticker when they finish reading a CEO article, rating, voting and doing mc question in specific date.
‧Certificate of third-class honor when receiving 15 e-stickers
‧Certificate of second-class honor when receiving 25 e-stickers
‧Certificate of first-class honor when receiving 25 e-stickers and write an article about experience in educating children

The important date:
planPopup.submit_end_msg: Deadline of handing in an article about experience in educating children:

msg.transborder_msg:
Use Cross-border Media Cloud Server

Under normal circumstances, Hong Kong, Macau and Malaysia users will use the "EVI International Media Cloud Server" by default. However, in some special cases, such as Hong Kong / Macau / Malaysia users watch the videos via the China Mainland network services, there will often be a "stuck" situation. As long as this setting is turned on, the performance of video playback will be greatly improved.

otherPage.about:
About Us

EVI Services Limited was established in 1999. It is the first IT technology company to successfully promote online learning in pre-school institutions. It is also a pre-school in Hong Kong. The largest information technology service provider in the health care market. We have always used the advantages of information technology to provide kindergarten teachers, parents and students with a variety of multimedia coffins that are diversified and kept up to date.

Injecting new elements of creative learning to extend learning power to home

The EVI Children's Education Information Network has two major platforms - School Dropout and Administration Platform and Children and Parents' Corner. The School Dropout and Administration Platform has a strong learning resources library and a school administration system to support the dropout and administration of teachers. It is connected to the Children and Parents' Corner to enable parents to have fun with their children at home. Reading and learning, revisiting what the teacher has taught in the classroom, consolidating the child's understanding of the content of dropping out of school, and extending the learning motivation to the home. At present, EVI has provided services to more than 300 kindergartens and 60,000 families. It has gained certain recognition in the education sector. In addition to providing online education courses, our professional team provides a variety of administrative system management services, hardware support, web page production, and teacher computer training to provide one-stop support services for schools, parents and students.

New developments in tablet dropouts

The use of tablet dropouts has become a new development direction in the global education community, and has begun to be integrated into the dropout of kindergartens, suitable for schoolchildren. A variety of interesting grouping activities make learning more interesting and interactive. EVI is also actively cooperating with the pace of the times and market needs. In 2013, the tablet EC-Pad was launched. EC-Pad integrates the dropout and administrative resources of the current EVI online dropout platform, and provides a large number of learning game apps to enable students to The game of the subject is interactively learned, and the progress of the study is recorded immediately, making the game more meaningful.

The debut of EC-Pad marks the beginning of a new milestone for EVI, and the tablet PC will be an important platform for EVI future courses and system development. Let us welcome multimedia tablets together with everyone. Learn the new generation!

School-based Chemistry Administration System

EVI's School Dropout and Administration Platform is equipped with a powerful academic administration system such as Attendance Management, Evaluation Management and Books Management, etc., the system can organize and apply the input data for teachers, provide data analysis, and assist teachers to easily handle daily academic administration. With the support and advice given by the school, our academic administration system has become increasingly mature, and it has been successfully implemented in various kindergartens over the years, and has gradually been recognized by users.

With the debut of EC-Pad, teachers can use EC-Pad's built-in mobile version of the academic administration system to more easily and quickly handle various administrative tasks through Cloud Computing. For example, teachers can use the Attendance Management system in EC-Pad to instantly name students; or through the Evaluation Management system, they can immediately input scores, comments and assessments for students. All students' attendance and evaluation records will be automatically uploaded to School dropout and administrative platform, teachers can print relevant reports for analysis and archiving, simplify work steps and improve efficiency.

EVI's academic administration system, in conjunction with EC-Pad and cloud technology, can greatly enhance the effectiveness, flexibility and reliability of each system, and combine them into the best administrative management model to simplify traditional and arduous learning. Work to bring a new user experience to the teacher!

Promoting parental education and promoting harmonious parent-child relationship

EVI's Children and Parents' World is a website of a size that will create a quality parent-child interaction time. Apart from this, we have been implementing various parent-child activities from time to time. In 2011, we also organised the Kissing Children and Happy Family Scheme with the Hong Kong Family Education Institute. This program aims to promote parental education and promote harmonious parent-child relationship. Through a series of parent lectures and large parent-child activities, we share the magical method of managing children with our parents and let everyone enjoy the fun of family activities. The family relationship enables children to grow healthily and happily.

Security Statement
All 'we' and 'the company' in this statement (other than the statement) refer to the relevant companies within EVI Services Ltd.
Although the Internet is not a secure communication environment in nature, it can enhance its security by applying appropriate technologies. This is an example of the company's approach. However, the security of the Internet is not a purely technical issue. The common sense and customary measures of personal and transaction data security are equally important. 'Hacker' intrusion into the system must go through a 'gate', which is often caused by negligence in the transmission of confidential documents or in the processing of confidential data such as passwords and personal identification codes. . Therefore, users must be extremely careful to protect these files and data.
The company is very cautious about security issues and strictly keeps all personally identifiable information obtained from users of the company's website. In addition to the use of firewalls and other sophisticated equipment, the company also provides and maintains the following measures to protect our systems, information and data from accidental or malicious damage.

*Safety Standards
The company adheres to international standards to ensure complete transactions and to protect confidential information. These standards are related to (i) business activities and information privacy practices; (ii) transaction integrity and (iii) information protection.

*Internal guidance for obtaining personally identifiable information
All employees of the company follow the company's internal guidelines for obtaining personally identifiable information. The guidelines are designed to limit the access to personal data only if they have legitimate needs. Those who have access to this information.
otherPage.privacy:
Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy and Personal Data Collection Statement All 'we' and 'the company' in this statement (other than the statement) refer to EVI Services Ltd.

I. Privacy Policy Statement

Our Commitment

The Company is committed to properly handling personal data to protect the privacy of its customers. We therefore ensure that the policies and practices in the collection, use, retention, transmission and access of personal data comply with the requirements of the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance (Chapter 486 of the Laws of Hong Kong).

Types of personally identifiable information collected

You may be asked to provide your personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your name, gender, age, telephone number, email address And residential address, etc. Refusal to provide such information may prevent you from accessing certain content on this website or cause us to be unable to process any application or request you submit, or may prevent you from achieving the purpose of browsing. If you are not 18 years of age or older, you must submit your personally identifiable information to the company with the consent of your parent or guardian.

Use of personally identifiable information collected

The specific purpose of your personally identifiable information may be set out in Part II of the Company's Personal Information Collection Statement below. (especially points (i) and (vi) of the third paragraph of Part II).

Data Retention

If you are a paid user, we will retain your personal identity submitted to us through the Internet, forms or other means during the service period after the expiration of the service. Information for a reasonable period of time.

Disclosure

Under normal circumstances, we will not disclose your information to third parties. For details, please refer to the Personal Information Collection Statement of Part II of the Company below.

Access and Amendment Information

If you wish to access and/or amend your personally identifiable information submitted to us through the Internet, forms or other means, please notify us in writing The company's data protection director. After each successful completion of the access, the company may charge you a reasonable fee at that time. However, if access to the data is made for a reasonable and reasonable correction, such fees will be waived.

Security

We use a variety of encryption technologies to transmit your personal data over the Internet, which is only accessible to our authorized staff. Based on the nature of the Internet, we will do our best to ensure the security of data transmission.

Collection of personally identifiable information

When you visit this website, it may trigger the use of cookies. A cookie is a small file that can be stored on a web user's computer to obtain configuration information and analyze the browsing habits of web users. They allow you to browse the site again without having to re-register and are often used to track the user's propensity on the subject matter of the site. You may refuse to accept cookies (by modifying the Internet options or browsing settings of your computer system), but in doing so, you may not be able to use or activate certain features provided on this website.

Online Services

We may launch an online store or service provider operated by a third party merchant on this website. If you want to use or order any of the services or merchandise provided by any of the above merchants, please note that any information you submit will not be controlled by the company once it has been transferred to the merchant, and therefore it is not owned by the company. The scope of protection.

Enquiry

If you have any enquiries about our Privacy Policy Statement, please feel free to contact us. The address is as follows:

3 Sham Mong Road, Tai Kok Tsui, Hong Kong

Room 1101, 11/F, North Block, Ka Wing Building

II. Personal Information Collection Statement

As a user of our company or a visitor or user of our website, you may be required to apply to and/or continue to use a service and/or product ('the service') The company provides your personal data (hereinafter referred to as 'personal data'). If your personal information is incomplete or incorrect, we may not be able to provide or continue to provide this service to you.

We will keep your personal information confidential at all times. The Company's policies and practices will be consistent with the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance (the “Ordinance”) and the provisions of this statement regarding the collection, use, retention, disclosure, transfer, security and access of personal data.

You also agree that any personal data provided by you to the Company may be used or retained by the Company for the following purposes and other
purposes or legal requirements as agreed by the parties from time to time: /p>

(i) Providing the service, including establishing a platform and app account, providing company information and school notices, etc.;

(ii) processing or related to the service Any of your benefits;

(iii) analyze, verify and/or check your credit, payment and/or status in connection with the provision of the service;

(iv ) processing any payment instructions, direct debit payment facilities and/or credit facilities requested by you;

(v) enabling your account related to the service to perform daily operations and/or unliquidated accounts The money can be recovered.

(vi) enables us to fulfill our obligations to connect with the parties to the communication or to abide by other industry practices.

According to the regulations, you have the right to:

(i) check if we hold your personal data;

(ii) consult with the company Your personal data;

(iii) ask the company to correct any inaccuracies in the personal data;

(iv) Frequently check the company's policies and practices related to personal data And determine the type of personal data held by the company. In accordance with the regulations, we are entitled to a reasonable fee when processing personal data inquiry requests. All inquiries or corrections to personal data or requests for policy and enforcement practices and the type of personal data held should be made in writing and sent to the Data Protection Officer of the Company.

Please note that this statement may be amended from time to time without notice. The effective date of the revised statement and amendment will be posted on our website. Modifications have no ability to trace back to the past.

If there are any outstanding issues in this clause, the company will handle the personal data collection statement, privacy policy or other relevant regulations and subsequent amendments.

Update Date: June 2019
